name: Homestead (itch) (Ben)
description:
A Sapcaster Vignette

Glimpse into a living pixel-art world. Tap that fullscreen button and chill for a bit. Poke a sheep if youre feeling like a meanie. Help us create more by joining our small world-building project at The Sapcaster ! 

Musical intro contributed by Christian Graves

Features:

-Incredible sheep action

-Eat some grass!

-Dont like your sheep? Reload the page! New sheep every time!

-Take a nap! (SO CUTE!!!)

-those old sheep are gone forever

-Bleat!

-Take a poop maybe

-and much much  more*

*not really sheep dont actually do that much
